title: Black-White
description: Mainly some screenshots of my eink devices, including YotaPhone 2, Kindle Paperwhite 2, and Boox Note. And a handsome photo of one of the cats in my house. The cover illustration is by Sakimori https://pawoo.net/@sakimori, one of my favourite illustrators. Apps inside screenshot No.5 to No.9 can be downloaded from f-droid repo or archive repo, including Kiwix (5), Gobandroid (6), mGit (7), etc.
